processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @message nvarchar(4000), @user int, @admin bit, @language char(1), @sys varchar(32), @m int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @language = @@language, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName' select @message = case @language when 'v' then N'Dữ liệu trong tệp không có hoặc không hợp lệ.' else N'The content of the data file is empty or invalid.' end
create table #r(tk varchar(32), ten_tk nvarchar(512), ma_kh varchar(32), ten_kh nvarchar(512), tk_cn tinyint, ps_no_nt numeric(19, 4), ps_co_nt numeric(19, 4), dien_giai nvarchar(512), ma_vv varchar(32), ma_hd varchar(32), ma_ku varchar(32), nh_dk varchar(32), ref varchar(32), stt int)
select @q = 'insert into #r(tk, ten_tk, ma_kh, ten_kh, tk_cn, ps_no_nt, ps_co_nt, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_hd, ma_ku, nh_dk, ref, stt)' select @q = @q + ' select a.tk, case when b.loai_tk = 1 then b.ten_tk%l else null end, a.ma_kh, c.ten_kh%l, ' select @q = @q + 'b.tk_cn, ps_no_nt, ps_co_nt, dien_giai, a.ma_vv, a.ma_hd, a.ma_ku, a.nh_dk, '''', a.stt' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a left join dmtk b on a.tk = b.tk left join dmkh c on a.ma_kh = c.ma_kh' exec sp_executesql @q
if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_vv <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_vv = '' or b.ma_vv is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmvv b on a.ma_vv = b.ma_vv if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_hd <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_hd = '' or b.ma_hd is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmhd b on a.ma_hd = b.ma_hd if not exists(select 1 from #r where ma_ku <> '') update #r set ref = ref + '1' else update #r set ref = ref + case when a.ma_ku = '' or b.ma_ku is not null then '1' else '0' end from #r a left join dmku b on a.ma_ku = b.ma_ku
select '' as message, 'this.frameElement.result = @@result;parent.set$Grid$ImportResult(this.frameElement);' as script select tk, ten_tk, ma_kh, ten_kh, tk_cn, ps_no_nt, ps_co_nt, dien_giai, ma_vv, ma_hd, ma_ku, rtrim(nh_dk) as nh_dk, ref from #r order by stt return
